title: ML from Scratch
description: A set of Machine Learning Projects developer from scratch. Serves as a Portfolio project.

title: XRay Pneumonia Detection GUI
description: A GUI application that detects pneumonia from XRay images using a Convolutional Neural Network.

title: Wake Word Detection
description: A wake word detection system that uses LSTM and Residual blocks to detect the wake word 'Hey Kocho'.

title: Basis Vector Encoding
description: This project demonstrates encoding and decoding messages using basis vectors.
